extends HudDiagram

      • getQuality

        private int getQuality(float degrees)
        Calculate a nice number where seams and edges are not really visible.
        Parameters:
        degrees - the angle of the part.
        Returns:
        a number that is dividable thru many number but that is still proportional to the chart when given quality number to the circle drawer.
